rooms.name: SpringfieldAvenue
rooms.description: You are on west Springfield Avenue, outside the Grainger Engineering Library.

rooms.name: GraingerEntry
rooms.description: You are in the north west entry of Grainger Engineering Library. You can see a staircase leading down, and a hallway to the east.

rooms.name: Staircase
rooms.description: You walk to the staircase. You see there is some kind of construction going on upstairs, and there are more people downstairs.

rooms.name: GraingerMainHallway
rooms.description: You are in the main hallway.  You can see a different set of staircases to the east and an exit to the south.

rooms.name: NorthQuad
rooms.description: You are on the North Quad. You see the sculpture of a man reading a book, which fills you with determination.

rooms.name: EastStaircase
rooms.description: You go to the top of the east staircase.  You can see a strange light coming from down the stairs.

rooms.name: CBTFRoom
rooms.description: You are at the CBTF Room!. You are now ready to give your CS final exam.

rooms.name: GraingerBasement
rooms.description: You are in the basement of Grainger.  You see tables with students working and a strange light to the east.
